name: MyBabyTalk
0:
”Alexa, open My Baby Talk”
”Alexa, start MY Baby Talk”
”Alexa, begin MY Baby Talk”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my baby talk
Developer Terms of Use
des:
When inside My Baby Talk, you can ask baby questions like: "Alexa, ask baby whose turn is it to change the diaper"? You can also play baby room music.

After you say Alexa, open My Baby Talk. These are the Baby requests you can make while in this Skill.

"Alexa, ask Baby who's turn it is to change the diaper"
"Alexa, ask Baby who's turn it is to feed the baby"
"Alexa, ask Baby what time is it"
"Alexa, ask Baby how do you feel"
"Alexa, ask Baby to tell a story"

There is even music to play in the Baby's room. Alexa, Play baby Music.

But please! Please seek out and support the artists who produced the songs included! Visit the Alexa App or BubbleLogix.com for information on our eBooks in the Amazon Kindle Store and our other works! My Baby Talk is a Bubble Logix property designed on Voice Flow!

Help us with Baby's Bio and personalize your Baby. Visit us on Bubblelogix.com for details.
**Bathe With Bubbles the Bobcat is now live. Try Bathe with Bubbles the Bobcat if you enjoyed My Baby Talk.

Please seek out and support the artists of these works:
Baby Steps by Adigold
Hush Little Baby by Stockwaves
Fairy Tale 2 by lucafrancini
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
